data.name: Rev:Spectator Mode
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
[i]Requires the Revolution Mod v1.3+[/i]
Team one gets to see all the units on the map from the holomap and bridge screens.
Ideal for hosting multi-player games with commentary for streaming but also useful for training your crews by taking control of AI units.
Uses library_custom_3.lua
